articles.title: Stock Market Live: Sensex, Nifty remain flat; ITC, Maruti shine; IT weak - Business Standard
articles.description: Closing Bell on Thursday, October 12, 2023:Infosys and Tech M were the worst hit on the 50-share index, dropping nearly 3 per cent each, followed by Apollo Hospitals, TCS, HCL Tech, LTIMindtree, Wipro
articles.content:
Stock market highlights: Benchmark indices snapped their two-day winning streak as weak quarterly result by Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) in Q2-FY24 took investor fund away from IT pack.

articles.author: Morgan Sung
articles.title: Twitch adds anti-harassment features to stop banned users from watching streams - TechCrunch
articles.description: Twitch has been rolling out features to crack down on targeted harassment over the last few months, including one that blocks unwanted users from viewing a channel's stream.
articles.content:
Twitch streamers can finally block banned users from watching their streams, thanks to a recent update to the platform’s anti-harassment features.
Twitch first announced the feature in August. Thoug… [+4036 chars]
